column2: Young people were already feeling depressed about their future retirement prospects, according to polls. More than $1 trillion has been wiped off the notional value of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum and the like in just a few months according to a Washington Post report, citing data from industry website CoinMarketCap.com. It’s 10 months since HBO talk show host Bill Maher called the crypto boom a “joke” and “Easter Bunny cartoon cash,” and urged his viewers to get out.
column4: ‘Easter Bunny cartoon cash’ — how Bill Maher called the Bitcoin crash
